column4: Tourism;Siem Reap (Rasmei News): Khmer ox carts in Siem Reap are currently attracting many foreign visitors ------to visit the rural landscape in the province.------F------oreign tourists can view the villages and understand about Khmer civilization and cultural ------traditions that have continued in this area since ancient times.------The service can help rural  families and also supports the conservation of this Cambodian tradition for the younger generations to recognize and understand their culture. ------ ------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%91%E1%9F%81%E1%9F%87%E1%9E%82%E1%9F%84%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%81%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%98%E1%9F%82%E1%9E%9A%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%93%E1%9F%85%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%81%E1%9F%81%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%8F%E1%9E%9F/
